description: System-generated unique identifier for each activity log record; used as the primary key.
Date and time the action occurred in the system (event timestamp).
Account or username of the person or process that performed the action.
Human-readable description of the action taken, including affected objects and counts where applicable.
Timestamp when this log record was last updated in the database (e.g., corrections or audits).
Likely the date/time of the most recent user-driven update to this record; confirm with SME.
Identifier of the account that originally created this log record.
Timestamp when this log record was created.
Identifier of the account that most recently updated this log record after creation.
Timestamp of the most recent update to this log record after creation.
